story-moment.THE ORB: Nebula blew up Gamora’s ship and left her to die out in space while retrieving the Orb, which housed an Infinity Stone, that her Master sought.
story-moment.RONAN THE ACCUSER: Upon absorbing the power of the Power Stone and becoming the most powerful being in the universe, Nebula pledged loyalty to Ronan the Accuser following his threat to end Thanos.
story-moment.FALLING INTO THE ASTER: Hanging on for dear life on the Aster, Gamora asked Nebula to stand against Ronan; Nebula objected and allowed herself to fall.
story-moment.A SPOT ON THE TEAM: Following a shaky alliance, Gamora offered her “sister” a spot on the team, but Nebula refused, citing that she needed to carry out her personal mission of ending Thanos.
story-moment.CAPTURED BY THANOS: Nearly killing the Mad Titan, Nebula was captured, tortured, and forced to reveal the fact that Gamora knows the location of the Soul Stone.

powers+abilities.DEADLY ASSASSIN: Nebula is one of the deadliest assassins in the galaxy, along with her “sister” Gamora, due to their extensive training under Thanos and Ronan the Accuser.
powers+abilities.BIO-MECHANICAL ENHANCEMENTS: Nebula's bio-mechanical enhancements at the hands of Thanos allowed Nebula to withstand intense injury and regeneratively heal quickly.
powers+abilities.EXPERT PILOT: Nebula is an expert pilot, maneuvering a M-ship and Neocrocraft with ease.
powers+abilities.ELECTROSHOCK BATONS: Nebula’s weapons of choice are her electroshock batons, which can be combined to create a staff.
